Articles.Content: I recently learned that the new ksp update is out, but when I open the game from the desktop shortcut, it opens the old version. When I tried to open it in steam, it still opened the old version. I really want the new update, PLEASE HELP ME!!!

Quote

In the steam client, right click on the game in your library list, select properties from the dropdown list, then in the Local files tab select Verify integrity of game cache.

If everything verifies correctly then you should have the latest patched release on the Steam servers.

1.8 was stuck on my "will download later" list so i had to activate it somewhow that i can't remember, but hopefully the above will sort it for you.
A small square button against the game title, with a triangle and a dash.
Right click on the game in the Steam start menu and select "Properties", then go to the "Betas" tab. Does it say "NONE - Opt out of all beta programs"?
